io.smudgr.app.threads

Class RenderThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.app.threads.AppThread
      • io.smudgr.app.threads.RenderThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RenderThread
extends AppThread
    The RenderThread is responsible for rendering every Smudge in the current application instance Project.getRack() at the Controller.TARGET_FPS rate.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RenderThread()
      Instantiate a new RenderThread with the target set to Controller.TARGET_FPS

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLastFPS()
      Gets the amount of frames rendered in the previous second.
      void startOutput(FrameOutput output, int everyXTicks)
      Start outputting rendered frames to the specified FrameOutput at a rate of everyXTicks
      void stopOutput()
      Stop any existing FrameOutput
